title: Did the Cochs contribute $500,000 to Paul Ryan after the tax plan was approved?
subtitle: Charles and Elizabeth Coch gave nearly half a million dollars to the House of Representatives fund-raising committee after the approval of the Republican Tax Code.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Charles and Elizabeth Coch contributed approximately $500,000 to the Paul Ryan Fundraising Committee after the approval of the General Tax Plan in the United States House of Representatives.
